Your New Way to Make Passive

cards.text_des_1: Unbox mystery NFTs and uncover rare treasures — excitement awaits with every reveal!

section4.main_title: Open Mystery NFT Buy, Sell, and Profit in Just 3 Steps!
section4.text_desc_sp: Your New Way to Make Passive Income Online - Open blind box NFTs, trade digital assets, and earn passive income daily!

card_1.text_desc: Getting started is quick and hassle-free. Create your account in seconds and unlock your journey into the NFT world.

card_2.text_desc: Purchase blind box NFTs to reveal valuable surprises—each box holds the potential for exciting rewards and profitable gains.

card_3.text_desc: Resell unopened NFT boxes and earn 9% more per trade—maximizing returns easily, quickly, and with zero risk.

section5.start_desc: In the celestial realms, Yuanshi Tianzun, the great heavenly sage, foresaw an imbalance that could shatter the world. To prevent chaos, he split the Chaos Pearl into two divine forces:
section5.text_desc_1: a force of destruction, wild and untamed.
section5.text_desc_2: a source of order, pure and divine.
section5.final_desc_2: The two orbs fell into the mortal realm, binding themselves to the two souls destined to clash, evolve, and reshape the world.
section5.final_desc_3: Will you unlock the Box of Chaos, unleashing fiery wrath?
section5.final_desc_4: Or will you open the Box of Harmony, awakening celestial might?
section5.final_desc_5: Their fates rest in your hands. Choose wisely.

section6.main_title: Blind Box NFTs, What Awaits Inside?
section6.text_desc_1: The Box of Chaos drops in the morning. The Box of Harmony releases in the evening. Choose your time.
section6.text_desc_2: Withdraw your rewards daily with a minimum payout of just $50 — fast, secure, and convenient via e-wallet or bank transfer.
section6.text_desc_3: Earn commission from your direct referrals and additional rewards from second-level referrals—building a sustainable passive income stream at easy.
section6.text_desc_4: Our expert support team is available 24/7 to ensure your experience on YiYa is smooth and successful.

section7.des_1:
The first wave of YiYa Blind Boxes is limited. Only 800 early collectors
will receive exclusive evolutions and bonus rewards!
section7.des_2:
Claim your YiYa Genesis NFT and gain priority access
to the future Fusion Event!
section7.des_3:
Invite your first friend and receive bonuses
Start the earning journey with your friend!

section8.text_title_2: The Fused Form – “YiYa: The Divine Equilibrium”
section8.text_title_3: The YiYa Fusion NFT is the rarest and most powerful form in the collection.

card_red.text_title: Holders of this exclusive NFT gain
card_red.text_list_1: A Legendary Status – One of the few to achieve the fusion.
card_red.text_list_2: Exclusive Rewards – Priority access to future events, airdrops, and secret evolutions.
card_red.text_list_3: Enhanced Value – The YiYa Fusion NFT is a one-of-a-kind asset in the marketplace.

card_blue.text_list_1: The Fusion Event lasts for a limited period after the final evolution is released.
card_blue.text_list_2: Once fused, the two separate NFTs are burned, creating the YiYa Fusion NFT.
card_blue.text_list_3: Only a select number of fusions can take place, making it one of the rarest NFTs in the YiYa universe.

section8.text_des_1: Will You Keep the Eternal Balance or Unleash the Ultimate Power?
section8.text_des_2: The path to fusion is not for everyone—but for those who succeed, a new legend will be born.

section9.text_des: Two legendary forces await you. Will you command the flames of Nezha or ride the waves of Ao Bing? Open your YiYa Box and start earning online today!
